skills.name: Double Strike
skills.blurb: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Master Yi's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} grant a [[stack]] of ''Double Strike'' for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks. At 3 stacks, '''Master Yi's''' next basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} consumes the stacks to strike twice, the second strike dealing {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}.
The second strike applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
If '''Master Yi's''' primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Master Yi's basic attacks on-hit grant a stack of Double Strike for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks. At 3 stacks, Master Yi's next basic attack on-hit consumes the stacks to strike twice, the second strike dealing 50% AD physical damage.
The second strike applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
If Master Yi's primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.
The second strike can critically strike structures.
skills.notes:
* Since ''Double Strike'' resets the counter on-attack and the second strike applies on-hit effects, the second strike is able to add a stack for the next ''Double Strike'' activation.
* If ''Double Strike's'' target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} shortly after the triggering attack, it will still occur and deal its effects as usual.

skills.name: Alpha Strike
skills.blurb: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} and becomes {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} and, after {{rutngt|0.2}}, marks the target enemy and then moves to mark the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring up to 3 times, once every {{rutngt|0.2}}.

Upon finishing marking, or if there are no longer any targetable enemies, he {{tip|blinks|reappears}} and becomes able to act again {{ft|after {{rutngt|0.15}}|{{tt|{{fd|1.087}} seconds|effective time due to game ticks}} after the start of the cast with 4 bounces}}in front of the target and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all marked enemies, increased against {{tip|monster|monsters}}. If the target {{tip|death|dies}} or gets too far away during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.
If there are no other un-marked enemies in range, he may strike the same enemies again, dealing {{fd|{{#var:l}}}}% damage instantly.

''Alpha Strike's'' primary and lesser damage can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|54}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{as|{{critical damage|{{#expr:54*{{#var:l}}/100}}}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} respectively.
Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} reduce ''Alpha Strike's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 1 second.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Master Yi vanishes and becomes unable to act and, after 0.231, marks the target enemy and then moves to mark the nearest visible un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring up to 3 times, once every 0.231.
Upon finishing marking, or if there are no longer any targetable enemies, he reappears and becomes able to act again in front of the target and deals physical damage to all marked enemies, increased against monsters. If the target dies or gets too far away during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.
If there are no other un-marked enemies in range, he may strike the same enemies again, dealing Unknown value: #var:l% damage instantly.
Alpha Strike's primary and lesser damage can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage and (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage respectively.
Basic attacks on-hit reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown by 1 second.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}} to {{#var:b5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AD)}}|Monster Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}}+{{#var:m1}} to {{#var:b5}}+{{#var:m5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AD)}}|Monster Bonus Damage|{{ap|{{#var:m1}} to {{#var:m5}}}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Alpha Strike's'' primary damage applies after '''Master Yi''' reappears.
* ''Alpha Strike's'' {{sti|cooldown reduction}} applies on {{tip|turret|structures}} but not when '''Master Yi''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* When '''Master Yi''' bounces from a unit it will grant {{tip|sight|vision}} in a 600 radius around it for up-until {{rutngt|0.6}} <!-- this 0.6s after reappearing value is not confirmed as "the one", btw, might also be 0.625s after reappearing or 0.75s after last bounce --> after ''Alpha Strike'' ends, including across terrain, though not into {{tip|brush|brushes}}. It will always grant vision around the primary target even if he doesn't bounce off it.
* ''Alpha Strike's'' damage is calculated the moment the mark is placed. Because of this it is possible to inflict differing amounts of damage if '''Master Yi''' changes his {{as|AD}} in the middle of ''Alpha Strike''.
* '''Master Yi''' will follow all his primary target's movements.
** ''Alpha Strike'' can only follow up-to {{tt|2000|From Yi's location at start of cast}} units; If the target teleports a very long distance, it will not be followed.
* If the primary target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and there are no other nearby valid targets, ''Alpha Strike'' will end prematurely and will not deal the damage occurring after '''Master Yi's''' reappearance.
* If the primary target is a champion '''Master Yi''' will automatically attack it once ''Alpha Strike'' ends, and thus '''Master Yi''' will not be able to buffer other abilities.{{bug}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block a single instance of damage.
*If '''Master Yi''' {{tip|death|dies}} during ''Alpha Strike'' and he is only focusing one target, the ability will only deal the reduced damage strikes and not the final tick of damage from reappearing.
** If he is striking multiple targets the damage will be dealt immediately when ''dying'', and if he ''dies'' before the bounce from the last target, ''Alpha Strike'' will deal reduced damage only to all units he already bounced from.{{bug}}
* If '''Master Yi''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during ''Alpha Strike'' and he is only focusing one target, the ability will deal the reduced damage strikes as normal and the final tick of damage after being ''resurrected''.
** If he is striking multiple targets, ''Alpha Strike'' will ''sometimes'' deal the reduced damage from repeated bounces and the main damage after being ''resurrected'', and ''sometimes'' only the reduced damage, unrelated to the number of targets available.{{bug}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Master Yi''' is performing ''Alpha Strike'':
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false|interrupts=death}}

skills.name: Meditate
skills.blurb: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|channels}} for up to 4 seconds, {{tip|healing}} himself every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% missing health}}|health}}.

While channeling, '''Master Yi''' gains {{tip|damage reduction}}, halved against {{tip|Turret|turrets}}, pauses {{ais|Wuju Style|Master Yi}} and {{ais|Highlander|Master Yi}} duration, and gains one stack of {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}} per second.

After the channel ends, '''Master Yi''' reduces incoming damage for another {{fd|0.25}} seconds, with lesser effectiveness against non-turret damage but greater effectiveness vs turret damage. {{bug|1}}<!-- Yes it scales down with ranks as of current patch contact AnataBakka or Teh 2020-04-20 -->
''Meditate'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Master Yi's''' basic attack timer.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Master Yi channels for up to 4 seconds, healing himself every 0.5 seconds, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
While channeling, Master Yi gains damage reduction, halved against turrets, pauses Master Yi's Wuju Style and Master Yi's Highlander duration, and gains one stack of Master Yi's Double Strike per second.
After the channel ends, Master Yi reduces incoming damage for another 0.25 seconds, with lesser effectiveness against non-turret damage but greater effectiveness vs turret damage. Unknown value: bug / 1
Meditate resets Master Yi's basic attack timer.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15 to 55}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15*2 to 55*2}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Minimum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8 to 55*8}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Maximum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8*2 to 55*8*2}} {{as|(+ 200% AP)}}}}
{{st|Post-Channel Damage Reduction|{{ap|100-60 to 100-70}}%|Post-Channel Turret Damage Reduction|{{ap|100-60/2 to 100-70/2}}%}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Healing Per Half Second: (+ 12.5% AP)
  • Maximum Healing Per Half Second: (+ 25% AP)
  • Minimum Total Healing: (+ 100% AP)
  • Maximum Total Healing: (+ 200% AP)

• Damage Reduction: %
  • Turret Damage Reduction: %

• Post-Channel Damage Reduction: %
  • Post-Channel Turret Damage Reduction: %

skills.name: Wuju Style
skills.blurb: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' empowers his sword, causing his basic attacks to deal {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} {{tip|on-hit}} for 5 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Master Yi empowers his sword, causing his basic attacks to deal bonus true damage on-hit for 5 seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage does not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} nor does it affect structures.
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage cannot be {{tip|block|blocked}} but can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Master Yi''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

effects.str: • True Damage: (+ 35% bonus AD)

skills.name: Highlander
skills.blurb: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} reduce the '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} of '''Master Yi's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] by 70%.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself from all {{tip|slow|slows}} and {{tip|cripple|cripples}} and gains {{tip|ghosting}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{tip|slow-immune|slow immunity}}, and {{tip|cripple-immune|cripple immunity}} all for the next 7 seconds.
While active, champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} extend the duration of ''Highlander'' by 7 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Champion takedowns reduce the current cooldown of Master Yi's basic Champion ability by 70%.
Active: Master Yi cleanses himself from all slows and cripples and gains ghosting, bonus attack speed, bonus movement speed, slow immunity, and cripple immunity all for the next 7 seconds.
While active, champion takedowns extend the duration of Highlander by 7 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|25 to 65}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%}}
skills.notes:
* There are two situations that can happen if '''Master Yi''' uses ''Highlander'' while ''Highlander's'' buff is active.
** If the buff's duration is under 7 seconds, the buff refreshes to 7 seconds.
** If the buff's duration is above 7 seconds nothing happens.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %
